location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Lieutenant Edward Lowes, Commander of the Ternate

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, instructs Lieutenant Edward Lowes, Commander of the Ternate, to deliver letters to Muscat before proceeding to the Presidency of Bombay to deliver packets there. The Resident states that, owing to hostilities between Arab powers in the Gulph [Gulf], Lowes must not hold any communications with the boats that he meets on his passage.
